programme.desc: A widowed surgeon visits her family's pear orchard in hopes of taking a break from her hectic life and reconnecting with her distant son. Once there, she begins to fall for the farm manager, Will, who is growing a new hybrid pear.

programme.title: A Valentine's Match
programme.desc: Fired from her job as a reality TV host, a woman returns home for Valentine's Day and finds herself running a town festival auction with her ex-fiance.

programme.title: The More Love Grows
programme.desc: Helen gets blindsided when her husband asks for a separation. With help from a friendly vet and a rambunctious stray dog, she rediscovers her strength and begins to rebuild her life.

programme.desc: Shari just moved back to D.C. after a breakup and hopes to start painting again. Inspiration hits when she meets Evan, a repairman who winds up actually being a gallery owner.
